bibl.title: The Poet Unleaved. Simonides and Callimachus.
The New Simonides. Contexts of Praise and Desire
bibl.author: HUNTER, Richard

bibl.note: Examines the relation between I.E.G. II2, Simonides, 22 and other elegiac remains.
HUNTER Richard, The Poet Unleaved. Simonides and Callimachus.
Deborah BOEDEKER and David SIDER (Edd.), The New Simonides. Contexts of Praise and Desire (Oxford, 2001) pp. 242-254.
